message:
I just want to share with you a vey nice experience I had in this week. on the weekend I had the pleasure to attend Startup Weekend in Guadalajara, Jalisco, Mexico. the largest Startup weekend in All latin America. I had the pleasure to see Drones, play with them and I've got captured from air :)

Yesterday I was also invited to an Event in #Wizeline and I also saw Drones and this time it wasn't as a toy! it was for Mining, Agriculture and Solar.

Can't Imagine if in the Middle East we start using these drones how much more efficient we can get. and how much money it will save us! 

Just wanted to share with you this experience :)

Have a good day

data.message:
You didn't hear about the Egyptian customs stopping a passenger with a toy airplane controlled with iPhones, did you?
Still a bit of a long way till people start even realising how important the tech industry is
